name: Dr. Gerald C. HAMM, Individual Citizen, Appellant v. BOARD OF EDUCATION FOR the SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania
name_abbreviation: Hamm v. Board of Education for the School District

judges: Before O'BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: Dr. Gerald C. HAMM, Individual Citizen, Appellant v. BOARD OF EDUCATION FOR the SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Matter transferred to Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Martin A. Ostrow, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Vincent J. Salandria, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 932
Dr. Gerald C. HAMM, Individual Citizen, Appellant v. BOARD OF EDUCATION FOR the SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 26, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Martin A. Ostrow, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Vincent J. Salandria, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O'BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
